      Imposes the effect's modifiers on the provided plot Assumes that the modifiers to be imposed at any given time will be at the head of the internal stack

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlotEffect

        public PlotEffect(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.Float[] modifiers,
                  java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Constructor that imports the parameters of the effect along with a custom block of code in which it can be used
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the effect
        description - A description of the effect
        modifiers - The production modifiers that the effect can impose {0: ORE | 1: ENERGY | 2: FOOD}
        runnable - The code to be executed when the effect is imposed through natural means

    • Method Detail

      • impose

        public void impose(Tile tile,
                   int mode)
            throws InvalidResourceTypeException
        Imposes the effect's modifiers on the provided plot Assumes that the modifiers to be imposed at any given time will be at the head of the internal stack
        Parameters:
        tile - The plot to be affected
        mode - The mode of effect [0: ADD | 1: MULTIPLY | 2: OVERWRITE]
        Throws:
        InvalidResourceTypeException

      • revert

        private void revert()
        Reverts the changes made by the effect to the last plot that it was assigned to

      • revertAll

        public void revertAll()
        Reverts all affected tiles back to their original states

      • swapTop

        private void swapTop()
        Swaps the positions of the first two values within the internal stack

      • executeRunnable

        public void executeRunnable()
        Executes the runnable

        Getter for the overlay
        Returns:
        The overlay of the effect
